hero.title: Live
hero.subtitle: your refuge
hero.description: Experience the magic of Puerto Vallarta in luxury condominiums designed for those who seek the extraordinary

overview.title: Experience the Magic
overview.subtitle: Live the Puerto Vallarta lifestyle
overview.description1: Discover a world where luxury meets the natural beauty of Puerto Vallarta's coast. Our meticulously designed residences offer an unparalleled living experience in Mexico's most coveted destination.
overview.description2: From pristine beaches to world-class dining, from vibrant culture to serene sunsets - every day becomes an extraordinary experience when you call YUG 286 SLAVIA home.
overview.description3: Join an exclusive community where sophisticated design meets the authentic charm of Puerto Vallarta, creating the perfect harmony between modern luxury and coastal paradise.

experience.description1: Meticulously crafted for a livable environment where functionality and versatility take precedence for the benefit of its inhabitants.
experience.description2: Precise details in its design offer a unique sense of privacy and belonging, without overlooking cutting-edge innovation in all its comforts.
experience.description3: A natural prolongation of life that flows seamlessly for those who dwell within.

beach.description: Steps from pristine shores with direct beach access

culture.description: Authentic Mexican heritage meets modern luxury

lifestyle.title: Luxury Living Redefined
lifestyle.subtitle: Where sophistication meets the Puerto Vallarta lifestyle
lifestyle.description1: Experience an unparalleled way of living where every detail has been carefully curated to exceed your expectations. Our luxury residences offer more than just a home – they provide a gateway to the most coveted lifestyle in Puerto Vallarta.
lifestyle.description2: From the moment you step inside, you'll discover how thoughtful design and premium amenities create an atmosphere of refined elegance that complements the natural beauty of this coastal paradise.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Yugoslavia 286 ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services in connection with our luxury condominium development in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.intro: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways:
collection.personal: Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact information you provide
collection.contact: Communication Data: Information from your inquiries, tour requests, and correspondence with us
collection.preferences: Preference Data: Your interests in specific units, amenities, or investment opportunities
collection.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, and website usage statistics

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.communication: To respond to your inquiries and schedule property tours
usage.services: To provide information about available units, pricing, and amenities
usage.marketing: To send you marketing communications about Yugoslavia 286 (with your consent)
usage.improvement: To improve our website and services based on your feedback
usage.legal: To comply with legal obligations and protect our legitimate business interests

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:
sharing.partners: With trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting business
sharing.legal: When required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety
sharing.business: In connection with a merger, sale, or transfer of assets (with notice to you)

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Access: Request copies of your personal data
rights.correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
rights.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances
rights.portability: Data Portability: Request transfer of your data to another organization
rights.objection: Objection: Object to our processing of your personal data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and understand user preferences. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

facebook.title: Social Media Advertising
facebook.content: We may use social media platforms, including Facebook and Instagram, to advertise our properties. When you interact with our ads or visit our social media pages, these platforms may collect information about you according to their own privacy policies.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: Our website and marketing efforts may integrate with third-party services:
thirdParty.analytics: Analytics Services: We use web analytics to understand how visitors use our website
thirdParty.social: Social Media Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, and other platforms for advertising and engagement
thirdParty.communications: Communication Tools: WhatsApp for customer inquiries and support
thirdParty.maps: Mapping Services: To display property location and nearby amenities

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. Contact information is typically retained for 7 years unless you request deletion.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: As Yugoslavia 286 operates in Mexico and may use international service providers, your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than Mexico. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

minors.title: Children's Privacy
minors.content: Our services are not directed to children under 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately.

advertising.title: Advertising and Marketing
advertising.intro: We may use your information for advertising and marketing purposes:
advertising.targeted: Targeted Advertising: Creating custom audiences for social media advertising
advertising.email: Email Marketing: Sending newsletters and property updates (with consent)
advertising.retargeting: Website Retargeting: Showing relevant ads to previous website visitors
advertising.optOut: You can opt out of marketing communications at any time by following unsubscribe instructions or contacting us directly.
